forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
